src:
【騙贏貴婦奈奈4】比基尼辣照超吸睛　富千金奢華生活臉書全曝光
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 顏凡裴, 鄒保祥, 林育緯
潤寅實業負責人楊文虎及王音之夫婦，賄賂8大公司高層，詐騙14家銀行上百億元，2人潛逃至美國，竟還越洋遙控女兒在台灣協助脫產。2人女兒楊宇晨檢調上月首度提訊楊宇晨出庭，原本貴為千金、氣質出眾的她，身穿囚服現身，神色顯得憔悴，和她在臉書上「白富美」的模樣簡直判若2人。



楊宇晨就像時下年輕人一樣，喜歡在臉書和親友分享生活，像是到美國紐約念書、各地旅遊、吃喝玩樂，還有多張在邁阿密海邊的清涼比基尼辣照，大秀曼妙身材的照片，生活十分多采多姿。








雖然楊宇晨的臉書沒有太多高檔奢侈行頭，但從她出入的場所，以及旅遊的國家及頻率，可以看出家境十分優渥，狂勝大多數和她同年齡的台灣年輕人，堪稱人勝利組。但如今卻因替父母脫產洗錢，淪為階下囚，跌宕起伏的人生彷彿一場戲。
















更新時間｜2019.11.05 14:23
text:
[Cheat Win Nana 4] Bikini Spicy Photo Super Eyes Rich Thousand Gold Luxury Life Facebook Full Exposure
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Yan Fanzhen, Zou Baoxiang, Lin Yuwei
The heads of Runyi Industrial, Yang Wenhu and Wang Yinzhi, bribed the top 8 companies, swindled 14 banks to tens of billions of yuan, and 2 people fled to the United States, and actually crossed the ocean to help their daughters in Taiwan. Yang Yuchen, a 2-person daughter, first reported to Yang Yuchen in court last month. She was originally a noble woman with a temperament. She appeared in a prison uniform and looked awkward. She and her "Bai Fumei" on Facebook were judged as if 2 people.



Yang Yuchen is like a young man nowadays. He likes to share his life with his friends and relatives on Facebook. He is like studying in New York, traveling around the country, eating, drinking, and having a photo of a cool bikini in the Miami Sea. Life is very diverse.








Although Yang Yuchen’s Facebook does not have many high-end luxury styles, from the places where she enters and exits, as well as the country and frequency of travel, it can be seen that the family is very good, and the majority of Taiwanese young people of the same age are victorious. group. But nowadays, because of the production of money laundering for his parents, he is a prisoner, and the ups and downs of life is like a play.
















Update time|2019.11.05 14:23
